title: List of compositions by Robert Schumann
text:
This list of compositions by <a href="Robert%20Schumann">Robert Schumann</a> is classified into <a href="piano">piano</a>, <a href="Vocal%20music">vocal</a>, <a href="orchestra">orchestra</a>l and <a href="Chamber%20music">chamber</a> works. All works are also listed separately, by <a href="opus%20number">opus number</a>. Schumann wrote almost exclusively for the piano until 1840, when he burst into song composition around the time of his marriage to <a href="Clara%20Schumann">Clara Wieck</a>.
By opus number.
Note that Opus 1-23 are all written for piano solo.
